LabeledToggle.label: Filled
LabeledToggle.help: Specify whether the glyph is filled (a polygon) or not (a closed polygon defined by line segments). This only applies to 2D closed glyphs

VectorEntry.label: Center
VectorEntry.help: Set the x, y, z coordinates of the origin of the axes

VectorEntry.label: Dimension
VectorEntry.help: XYZ cell dimensions of a block

VectorEntry.label: FractalValue
VectorEntry.help: Map this value to 0.5 for use as a volume fraction.

VectorEntry.label: MaximumLevel
VectorEntry.help: Determines how deep to refine the grid.

LabeledToggle.label: GhostLevels
LabeledToggle.help: Set whether to generate overlapping ghost levels.

LabeledToggle.label: Asymetric
LabeledToggle.help: Some blocks have X dimension larger by 2.

LabeledToggle.label: RectilinearGrids
LabeledToggle.help: Set whether to generate rectilinear grids or uniform grids

Scale.label: Time step
Scale.help: Set the current timestep.

Scale.label: Tip resolution
Scale.help: Set the number of faces on the tip.

Scale.label: Tip radius
Scale.help: Set the radius of the widest part of the tip.

Scale.label: Tip length
Scale.help: Set the length of the tip (the whole arrow is length 1)

Scale.label: Shaft resolution
Scale.help: Set the number of faces on shaft

Scale.label: Shaft radius
Scale.help: Set the radius of the shaft

VectorEntry.label: Scale
VectorEntry.help: Set the size of the axes

VectorEntry.label: Origin
VectorEntry.help: Set the x, y, z coordinates of the origin of the axes

LabeledToggle.label: Symmetric
LabeledToggle.help: Select whether to display the negative axes

ThumbWheel.label: X length
ThumbWheel.help: The length of the cube in the x direction.

ThumbWheel.label: Y length
ThumbWheel.help: The length of the cube in the y direction.

ThumbWheel.label: Z length
ThumbWheel.help: The length of the cube in the z direction.

VectorEntry.label: Center
VectorEntry.help: Set the center of the cube.

Scale.label: Resolution
Scale.help: Set the number of faces on this cone

ThumbWheel.label: Radius
ThumbWheel.help: Set the radius of the widget part of the cone

ThumbWheel.label: Height
ThumbWheel.help: Set the height of the cone

LabeledToggle.label: Capping
LabeledToggle.help: Set whether to draw the base of the cone

Scale.label: Resolution
Scale.help: The number of facets used to define the cylinder.

ThumbWheel.label: Height
ThumbWheel.help: The height of the cylinder (along the y axis).

VectorEntry.label: Center
VectorEntry.help: Set the center of the cylinder.

LabeledToggle.label: Capping
LabeledToggle.help: Set whether to draw the ends of the cylinder

Module.name: LineSource
Module.button_help: Measure the distance between two points. Use the 'p' key to pick the points.

LineWidget.help: Set the start and end point for the line

ThumbWheel.label: Resolution
ThumbWheel.help: The number of pieces to divide the line into.

Module.name: ImageMandelbrotSource
Module.button_help: Create a fractal image or volume.

VectorEntry.label: Extent
VectorEntry.help: Set the min and max values of the data in each dimension

VectorEntry.label: Sub-space
VectorEntry.help: Choose which axes of the data set to display

VectorEntry.label: Origin
VectorEntry.help: Set the imaginary and real values for C (constant) and X (initial value)

VectorEntry.label: Size
VectorEntry.help: Set the inaginary and real values for the world size of the volume for C (constant) and X (initial value)

Scale.label: Max. iterations
Scale.help: The limit on computational iterations. Values less than 2.0 after this many iterations are considered in the set.

VectorEntry.label: Dimension
VectorEntry.help: 1D:Binary tree line,2D:Quadtree plane,3D:Octree volume.

VectorEntry.label: MaximumLevel
VectorEntry.help: Determines how deep to refine the grid.

VectorEntry.label: MinimumLevel
VectorEntry.help: Determines how deep to refine the grid.

VectorEntry.label: Sub-space
VectorEntry.help: Choose which axes of the data set to display

VectorEntry.label: Origin
VectorEntry.help: Set the imaginary and real values for C (constant) and X (initial value)

VectorEntry.label: Size
VectorEntry.help: Set the inaginary and real values for the world size of the volume for C (constant) and X (initial value)

Scale.label: Max. iterations
Scale.help: The limit on computational iterations. Values less than 2.0 after this many iterations are considered in the set.

VectorEntry.label: Threshold
VectorEntry.help: Data threshold helps determine when to subdivide node.

VectorEntry.label: Origin
VectorEntry.help: Set the position of the origin of the plane.

VectorEntry.label: First point
VectorEntry.help: Set the position of the point defining the first axis.

VectorEntry.label: Second point
VectorEntry.help: Set the position of the point defining the second axis.

ThumbWheel.label: X resolution
ThumbWheel.help: The number os x pieces to divide the plane into.

ThumbWheel.label: Y resolution
ThumbWheel.help: The number of y pieces to divide the plane into.

VectorEntry.label: Center
VectorEntry.help: Set the coordinates for the center of the sphere.

ThumbWheel.label: Radius
ThumbWheel.help: Set the radius of the sphere

Scale.label: Theta Resolution
Scale.help: Set the number of points in the longitude direction (ranging from Start Theta to End Theta)

Scale.label: Start Theta
Scale.help: Set the starting angle in the longitude direction

Scale.label: End Theta
Scale.help: Set the ending angle in the longitude direction

Scale.label: Phi Resolution
Scale.help: Set the number of points in the latitude direction (ranging from Start Phi to End Phi)

Scale.label: Start Phi
Scale.help: Set the starting angle in the latitude direction

Scale.label: End Phi
Scale.help: Set the ending angle in the latitude direction

VectorEntry.label: Center
VectorEntry.help: Set the center of the superquadric

VectorEntry.label: Scale
VectorEntry.help: Set the scale of the superquadric

Scale.label: Theta resolution
Scale.help: The number of points in the longitude direction.

Scale.label: Phi resolution
Scale.help: The number of points in the latitude direction.

Scale.label: Thickness
Scale.help: Changing thickness maintains the outside diameter of the toroid.

Scale.label: Theta roundness
Scale.help: Values range from 0 (rectangular) to 1 (circular) to higher order.

Scale.label: Phi roundness
Scale.help: Values range from 0 (rectangular) to 1 (circular) to higher order.

VectorEntry.label: Size
VectorEntry.help: Isotropic size

LabeledToggle.label: Toroidal
LabeledToggle.help: Whether or not the superquadric is toroidal or ellipsoidal

Module.name: RTAnalyticSource
Module.button_help: Regular rectilinear grid in up to three dimensions with values varying according to a periodic function.

VectorEntry.label: Extent
VectorEntry.help: Extent (dimensions) of the function.

VectorEntry.label: Center
VectorEntry.help: Center of the function.

VectorEntry.label: Maximum
VectorEntry.help: Maximum value of the function

VectorEntry.label: X Freq.
VectorEntry.help: Frequency in X

VectorEntry.label: Y Freq.
VectorEntry.help: Frequency in Y

VectorEntry.label: Z Freq.
VectorEntry.help: Frequency in Z

VectorEntry.label: X Mag.
VectorEntry.help: Wave amplitude in X

VectorEntry.label: Y Mag.
VectorEntry.help: Wave amplitude in Y

VectorEntry.label: Z Mag.
VectorEntry.help: Wave amplitude in Z

VectorEntry.label: Standard dev.
VectorEntry.help: Standard deviation of the gaussian
